examples: mozilla/5.0 (macintosh; intel mac os x 10_14_5) applewebkit/537.36 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/75.0.3770.100 safari/537.36

is.desc: Client browser details (property names depend on browser)
examples: { chrome: true, version: '71.0.3578.98', versionNumber: 71, mac: true, desktop: true, webkit: true, name: 'chrome', platform: 'mac' }

touch.desc: Client browser runs on device with touch support

webStorage.desc: Client browser has Web Storage support

iframe.desc: Does the app run under an iframe?

parseSSR.desc: For SSR usage only, and only on the global import (not on $q.platform)

returns.desc: Platform object (like $q.platform) for SSR usage purposes
